snippet: Pitcher Ron Guidry, who wound up playing in center field at Yankee Stadium on two occasions, understood why Mariano Rivera enjoyed shagging fly balls during practice.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Baseball column on former New York Yankees pitcher Ron Guidry's reaction to news of Yankees closer Mariano Rivera's season-ending injury while shagging fly balls in the outfield before a game.
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Ron Guidry, who wound up playing in center field at Yankee Stadium on two occasions, understood why Mariano Rivera enjoyed shagging fly balls during practice.

headline.seo: Like Mariano Rivera, Ron Guidry Was Drawn to the Outfield
headline.main: Guidry Can Relate to Allure of Outfield
headline.print_headline: Guidry Can Relate to the Allure of the Outfield
